entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. A few showers or drizzle beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few showers or drizzle ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
